ARABIC: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they are flung into it they will hear it gasping harshly as it seethes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When they are cast into it, they will hear it roar and raging
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When they will be cast into it, they will hear it roar as it boils,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When they are thrown into hell, they will hear its roaring while it boils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They will hear it hissing when they will be thrown into it, and it is boiling.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When they are cast therein, they will hear its Shahiq while it is simmering.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When they shall be cast therein, they shall hear a loud moaning of it as it heaves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When they are cast into it they will hear it sighing, the while it boils
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When they are flung therein they hear its roaring as it boileth up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When they are cast into it, they will hear its roaring as it boils up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When they will be cast thereinto, they will hear thereof a braying even as it balleth up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When they are thrown in it, they hear it blaring, as it seethes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When they are cast therein, they will hear the (terrible) drawing in of its breath even as it blazes forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When they are cast therein, they will hear the (terrible) drawing in of its breath as it blazes forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When they are cast into it they shall hear it sighing, while it boils
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When they are thrown into it, they will hear it roaring, as it seethes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [67:7] When they are flung into it they hear it blaring, [producing] a horrid sound like that of an ass, as it seethes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When they are flung therein) when one of the nation is flung therein, i.e. the Jews, Christians, the Magians and the Arab idolaters, (they hear its roaring) Gehenna emitting a sound like the sound of an ass (as it boils up,
